Product.Name: Zebra Print Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: Have some fun in these large lens sunglasses with a zebra strip pattern on the sides. These zebra print frames are made from durable plastic with a wire core. Lenses come in three different colors, tan lenses, violet lenses or pink lenses. All lenses are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.

Product.Name: Thick Frame Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: You'll love these sporty style, thick framed sunglasses. The shape of these glasses are more sporty, so they wrap around your face, blocking peripheral light as well as head on light. Our thick frame glasses are still surprisingly light weight, made from durable, scratch resistant plastic with a wire core to hold their shape firmly. Lens options for these shades include rose colored lenses, brown tinted lenses, and black tinted lenses. All lens options are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.

Product.Name: Speckled Aviator Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: Try on our Speckled Aviators, a fun spin on the classic aviators. The metal frame on these sunglasses includes a speckled pattern on the top half of each lens, which continues on to gently swoop over your ears. Unlike a typical aviator, these sunglasses have a single nose bridge in an hourglass sideways shape. Lens options for these speckled aviators include purple lenses, pink lenses, turquoise lenses and black tinted lenses. All lens options are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.

Product.Name: Sun Standard Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: Sometimes the oldies are the goodies. These classic standard sunglasses look great on both men and women. The frame is made from durable, scratch resistant plastic, and comes in three colors, black, white and red. With the white frame glasses, the lenses are tinted more than the black frame and red frame sunglasses. Both types of lenses are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.

Product.Name: Aviator Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: Aviator glasses are a classic style for both men and women. These solid metal frames are durable and scratch resistant, with a double nose bridge and our patented soft rubber nose pads. The lenses come in black or brown; both color options block harmful UV rays. You'll look so good in these aviators that you won't want to take them off.
Product.MoreInfoTitle: Unisex Aviator Sunglasses With Black or Brown Lenses
Product.MoreInfoMetaDescription: Buy these classic aviator sunglasses today! Choose between black or brown lens metal frame aviators with a double nose bridge.

Product.Name: Men's Accent Screw Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: These accent screw sunglasses are our most popular style in men's sunglasses. Made from durable plastic with a wire frame, these sunglasses will last you many years. Lenses come in the regular tinted shade, as well as a slate blue and a darker black option. All shade options are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.
Product.MoreInfoMetaKeywords: men's sunglasses, thick frame sunglasses, slate blue lenses

Product.Name: Men's Red Sunglasses
Product.MoreInformationText: Sometimes the oldies are the goodies. These classic standard sunglasses look great on both men and women. The frame is made from durable, scratch resistant plastic, and comes in three colors, black, white and red. With the white frame glasses, the lenses are tinted more than the black frame and red frame sunglasses. Both types of lenses are engineered to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays.
